Question
========
  
The association between body height and the score on a mathematics test disappears when the researcher statistically controls for gender. What type of variable is gender?

  
Answerlist
----------
* A ‘confounding’ variable.
* A ‘lurking’ variable.
* An ‘intervening’ variable.
* A ‘moderator’ variable.

* Incorrect
